7// validationGL32.cpp: Validation functions for OpenGL 3.2 entry point parameters
8
9#include "libANGLE/validationGL32_autogen.h"
10
11namespace gl
12{
13
14bool ValidateMultiDrawElementsBaseVertex(const Context *context,
15 PrimitiveMode mode,
16 const GLsizei *count,
17 DrawElementsType type,
18 const void *const *indices,
19 GLsizei drawcount,
20 const GLint *basevertex)
21{
22 return true;
23}
24
25bool ValidateProvokingVertex(const Context *context, ProvokingVertexConvention modePacked)
26{
27 return true;
28}
29
30bool ValidateTexImage2DMultisample(const Context *context,
31 GLenum target,
32 GLsizei samples,
33 GLenum internalformat,
34 GLsizei width,
35 GLsizei height,
36 GLboolean fixedsamplelocations)
37{
38 return true;
39}
40
41bool ValidateTexImage3DMultisample(const Context *context,
42 GLenum target,
43 GLsizei samples,
44 GLenum internalformat,
45 GLsizei width,
46 GLsizei height,
47 GLsizei depth,
48 GLboolean fixedsamplelocations)
49{
50 return true;
51}
52
53} // namespace gl
